genericContent.itemName: SCEPTRE X425BV-FHD 42" with RCA Home Theater System and 6ft HDMI Cable, TV Bundle
genericContent.shortDescription:
The Sceptre 42" Class LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV delivers top-of-the-line picture and audio quality. This Sceptre 42" LCD HDTV features a sleek and slim look that will give your home a new feeling with its eye-catching glossy black housing that shines elegantly throughout the room. The built-in ATSC/NTSC/QAM and TruSurround HD help provide you with vivid images and sound. The high-quality and superieor HD experience make the 42" 1080p HDTV a wise investment for any home.

Note: You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sceptre LCD HDTV. Contact your local cable or satellite TV service provider for details on how to upgrade.
genericContent.longDescription:
Sceptre 42" Class LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV, X425BV-FHD:

  • 16:9 LCD panel
    With 1920 x 1080 Full-HD resolution
  • 42" class screen size
    42" screen of this Sceptre LCD HDTV is measured diagonally from corner to corner
  • Built-in digital tuner
    Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available on this Sceptre 42" LCD HDTV
  • High brightness of 400 cd/m2 with 5-ms. response time
    Place your Sceptre LCD HDTV anywhere
  • 50,000:1dynamic contrast ratio
  • HDMI Inputs: 3
    Enjoy a superior HD experience with the HDMI one-cable solution
